# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this remarkable item to you for $11,000, which I believe is a fair and competitive price considering its worth to you. This opportunity is exclusive to you, and I encourage you to make a decision promptly to secure this unique acquisition. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
